filename.ext.long: base64-encoded sha1 digest, left-zero-padded to 21 bytes
filename.ext.short: base64-encoded last 3 bytes of sha1 digest
filename.ext.url: the URL link to the file
filename.ext.uuid: The string representation of a RFC 4122 UUID.
filename.ext.label: The vanity label (if one exists)
filename.ext.note: An optional string to remind you of the file contents
